response.answer_text: How old was Harry Potter in the first book, Harry Potter and the Sorcerer’s Stone? Harry is approximately fifteen or sixteen months old when we first meet him in the first chapter of Harry Potter and the Philosopher/Sorcerer’s Stone. The next chapter skips forward a decade or so, with Harry ten years old. He turns eleven a chapter or so later.

He turned 11 at the start of the book. Hogwarts classes are strictly grouped around ages: 1 class: 11–12 year olds 2 class: 12–13 year olds 3 class: 13–14 year olds 4 class: 14–15 year olds 5 class: 15–16 year olds (O.W.L exams) 6 class: 16–17 years old 7 class: 17–18 years old (N.E.W.T exams, note that according to wizard law you are full of age at 17)
